name: Glitch Boy
summary:
In the year 2015, Glitch Boy appeared in an abandonned arcade room. He was here to save the world from the evil arcade cabinet and prevent the world from being totally bugged.

Hurry, Glitch Boy! Use your Glitch Gun to destroy the machines, but be careful, it's kinda broken...
